duties_responsibilities.duty: Installing all equipment necessary to modify brand-new vehicles into police and emergency vehicles.
Reading drawings, including electrical schematics and performing industrial tasks related to automotive installation.
Working independently, maintaining accurate records, finding efficiencies, and contributing ideas to the company.
Supplying their own set of tools commonly used in the performance of automotive repair work.

education_certification.credential: Experience working with automotive electrical and mechanical systems.
Completion of at least two years, preferably graduated, from a four-year trade school, vocational high school or equivalent, with courses in general shop and automotive repair.
Valid mechanic’s license or ASE Automotive Technician or EVT Emergency Vehicle Technician certification preferred.
